title: Harpist Finds Zoo's Primates A Captive Audience
teaser: Terry Tacheny is a therapeutic harpist, whose music is meant to soothe hospital patients. As for the gorillas, she admits, "I don't speak gorilla," but the primates "purr" when she starts to play.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
